name: No Excavation Needed (Ludum Dare #36)
description:
A game about finding things in the sand, or archaeology, or 3D platforming. Short but sweet. Play as the enthusiastic Dr Turquoise in a quest for the highest button... If you have one, play with gamepad! I didn't have time to fine tune the controls and level design but with a gamepad the controls are ok.

Created with Unity 5. Music created in Ableton Live and sound effects made with Sfxr.
